name: Boys Craft: SuperHeroes
description:
Free sandbox with superheroes, crazy craft, build what you like, and the heroes of the game will help you. Meet with a bat, spider friendly, Wonder Woman, Super Girl, and other characters with superabilities. The game offers a variety of biomes and maps, explore caves and mines.

The unique system of selecting characters (for boys and girls), a variety of maps, search for resources and craft items to create different buildings, survival and much more will not let you get bored!

Three game modes: classic, creative and new mode "Township", where you can continue development and building your own city, which inhabited by different characters, communicate with townspeople, build your own houses, fortresses, shops, cafe or other creative buildings

- Completely free game for kids and adults.
- New biome - Wasteland.
- A large set of interior and furniture selection.
- Two texture packs and new blocks.
- Explore the mine, mining treasures and make new friends.
- Mobile edition includes new maps and characters inhabiting this world!
